list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: to the utmost or most absolute extent or degree; absolutely; completely.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: it's quite out of the question
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Đó là khá nhiều câu hỏi

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: to a certain or fairly significant extent or degree; fairly.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Nó khá ấm áp bên ngoài

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: expressing agreement with or understanding of a remark or statement.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: “I don't want to talk about that now.” “Quite.”
